General.Name: Thermaltake Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Thermaltake Technology Co., Ltd. offers entertainment, e-sports, technology, and lifestyle products in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides cases, power supplies, and coolers under the Thermaltake brand; keyboards, headsets, mice, and accessories under the Tt eSPORTS brand name; and mobile accessories under the LUXA2 brand. It also operates an e-shopping site under the Tt Buy brand name. It serves its customers through distributors and retailers. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
